all.name: Air Filter
all.description: The Mitsubishi Motors Air Filter (Part No. 1500A098) is a high-efficiency HEPA replacement filter for Mitsubishi vehicles. It meets or exceeds OEM standards, removing 99.97%â€“99.99% of airborne particles for superior engine protection. Available for sale at Parts Drive India.

all.name: Combination Switch
all.description: The Mitsubishi OE Understeering Switch (Part No. MR277924) is a genuine combination switch designed for Mitsubishi vehicles, controlling headlights, turn signals, and more. Engineered for precise fit and durability, it ensures seamless functionality. Available for sale at Parts Drive India.
